summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Corliss Avenue, from East Green Lake Blvd to North 85th Street, et al., by grading and providing for the necessary surface drainage all in accordance with Resolution No. 2490 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City Of Seattle.
